description: Writing articles, blog posts, tutorials, guides, and technical content for audiences
principles: Content should be engaging and hold the reader's interest
Information should be accurate and well-researched
Writing should be clear and appropriate for the audience
Structure should guide the reader from start to finish
Practical examples and takeaways should be provided

input: Clear topic or subject for the content
Key points or sections to cover

qualityCriteria.completeness: All main points covered, includes examples, has clear conclusion or takeaway
qualityCriteria.correctness: Information is accurate, facts are verified, quotes properly attributed
qualityCriteria.consistency: Tone consistent throughout, terminology consistent, formatting consistent
qualityCriteria.clarity: Easy to understand, explains concepts clearly, appropriate for target audience
qualityCriteria.engagement: Compelling introduction, maintains reader interest, practical and actionable
qualityCriteria.maintainability: Easy to update or expand, well-organized sections, clear structure

commonPatterns: Start with compelling introduction that hooks the reader
Use clear section headers to guide readers
Include practical examples and use cases
Break up text with lists, code blocks, or visuals when helpful
End with key takeaways or conclusions
Proofread carefully for grammar and style
antiPatterns: Poor organization that's hard to follow
Too long or unfocused on the main topic
